member.name: T:SharpDX.Toolkit.Audio.Pool`1
member.summary: A base class for a pool of items.
member.typeparam: The item type that will be managed by the pool.

member.name: M:SharpDX.Toolkit.Audio.Pool`1.Acquire(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Tries to either reuse an existing item or to create a new one.
member.param: Indicates whether to track the new item as active or not.
member.returns: The created or recycled item.
member.exception: Is thrown when there is no available item to recycle and new one cannot be created.

member.name: M:SharpDX.Toolkit.Audio.Pool`1.Clear
member.summary: Clears this pool from all active and free items.

member.name: M:SharpDX.Toolkit.Audio.Pool`1.Return(`0)
member.summary: Returns an used item for recycling.
member.param: The item to return for recycling.

member.name: M:SharpDX.Toolkit.Audio.Pool`1.TryAcquire(System.Boolean,`0@)
member.summary: Tries to acquire a free item or create a new one.
member.param: Indicates whether to track the new item as active or not.
The acquired item or default(TItem) if the operation did not succeed.
member.returns: true if the operation succeeded, false - otherwise.

member.name: M:SharpDX.Toolkit.Audio.Pool`1.ClearItem(`0)
member.summary: Allows derived classes to execute additional logic when an item is cleared from this pool.

member.name: M:SharpDX.Toolkit.Audio.Pool`1.IsActive(`0)
member.summary: Derived classes must implement this method to determine if an item is active or not.
member.param: The item to determine if it is active.
member.returns: true if the item is active, false - otherwise.

member.name: M:SharpDX.Toolkit.Audio.Pool`1.TryCreate(System.Boolean,`0@)
member.summary: Derived classes must implement this method to allow creation of a new item.
member.param: Indicates whether to track the new item as active or not.
The created item.
member.returns: true if creation succeeded, false - otherwise.

member.name: M:SharpDX.Toolkit.Audio.Pool`1.TryReset(System.Boolean,`0)
member.summary: Tries to recycle an item. The default implementation doesn't do anything.
member.param: Indicates whether to track the new item as active or not.
The item to recycle.
member.returns: true if recycling succeeded, false - otherwise. The default implementation always returns true.

member.summary: Recomputes the lists of active and free items.
